${modID}:CripplingBolt.NAME: Crippling Bolt
${modID}:CripplingBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL ${modID}:Jam.

${modID}:Tinker.NAME: Tinker
${modID}:Tinker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.
${modID}:Tinker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.

${modID}:HonedShot.NAME: Honed Shot
${modID}:HonedShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Preemptive Strike
${modID}:PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw an additional card.

${modID}:ExplosiveBolt.NAME: Explosive Bolt
${modID}:ExplosiveBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Jam.

${modID}:RepeatingShot.NAME: Repeating Shot
${modID}:RepeatingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of this card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SplittingBolt.NAME: Splitting Bolt
${modID}:SplittingBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:Virulence.NAME: Virulence
${modID}:Virulence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply ${modID}:Blight, apply an additional !M! ${modID}:Blight.

${modID}:WeepingWounds.NAME: Weeping Wounds
${modID}:WeepingWounds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ${modID}:Blight equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:Rangefinding.NAME: Rangefinding
${modID}:Rangefinding.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Upgrade 2 random cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${modID}:FlamingBolt.NAME: Flaming Bolt
${modID}:FlamingBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of its turn, the enemy takes !D! damage.

${modID}:Rummage.NAME: Rummage
${modID}:Rummage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:FleetFooted.NAME: Fleet-Footed
${modID}:FleetFooted.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:Brace.NAME: Brace
${modID}:Brace.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:FlashPellets.NAME: Flash Pellets
${modID}:FlashPellets.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SwiftShot.NAME: Swift Shot
${modID}:SwiftShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SwiftShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ScrapIronScarecrow.NAME: Scrap Scarecrow
${modID}:ScrapIronScarecrow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your turn, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:BallisticShot.NAME: Ballistic Shot
${modID}:BallisticShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double this card's damage this combat. NL Increase this card's cost by 1 this combat.

${modID}:CoveringFire.NAME: Covering Fire
${modID}:CoveringFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL The next Skill you play costs 0.

${modID}:PinDown.NAME: Pin Down
${modID}:PinDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:HunkerDown.NAME: Hunker Down
${modID}:HunkerDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next 2 turns. NL ${modID}:Jam.

${modID}:DrainingTouch.NAME: Draining Touch
${modID}:DrainingTouch.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ClusterBolt.NAME: Cluster Bolt
${modID}:ClusterBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL ${modID}:Jam ALL cards in your hand.

${modID}:Blueprint.NAME: Blueprint
${modID}:Blueprint.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and Upgrade them for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Replicate.NAME: Replicate
${modID}:Replicate.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Add a copy of that card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Plague.NAME: Plague
${modID}:Plague.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Blight to ALL enemies X times.
${modID}:Plague.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Blight to ALL enemies X+1 times.

${modID}:CreepingInfection.NAME: Creeping Infection
${modID}:CreepingInfection.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Blight. NL Enemy gains !M! ${modID}:Blight at the end of each of its turns. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Reclamation.NAME: Reclamation
${modID}:Reclamation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
${modID}:Reclamation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Maintenance.NAME: Maintenance
${modID}:Maintenance.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.
${modID}:Maintenance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Upgrade 2 random cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${modID}:WallOfThorns.NAME: Wall of Thorns
${modID}:WallOfThorns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Blight.

${modID}:TripCharge.NAME: Trip Charge
${modID}:TripCharge.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Trap. NL Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the least HP.

${modID}:BaitAndSwitch.NAME: Bait and Switch
${modID}:BaitAndSwitch.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle !M! *Trip *Charge into your draw pile.

${modID}:BountyHunting.NAME: Bounty Hunting
${modID}:BountyHunting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain an additional card reward at the end of combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ScavengeCells.NAME: Scavenge Cells
${modID}:ScavengeCells.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] . NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.
